title: Can a fellow Rioter gift me 1 RP for these fan-arts that I made a long time ago?

embed.description: Lulu: The Fae Sorceress Button pin design available for purchase with a price of $2.50. I'll make an ebay/paypal link available in the future for ... League of Legends: Lulu (button pin)

body:
Greetings! To my dismay I'm short by 1 RP to buy the Woad Ashe skin that's currently on sale for 260 RP. If possible, I would like to ask a fellow Rioter to gift me 1 RP for these fan-arts I made a long time ago. I've attached the images in this post. Thank you in advanced! 

Username: Kino4500
Summoner Name: Nicosarea

I've also made Vi, Zed, Riven, and Leona which can all be viewed in my Deviantart gallery: 
http://kino4500.deviantart.com/gallery/39187273/League-of-Legends

replies.body:
These are really cute - and I think Lulu is probably the best of the group!  
(Soft spot for Nami though.)

For very tiny amounts of RP, you might try submitting a ticket (as well as one of these awesome drawings) and see if Player Support can help you - Rioters on the boards generally don't have the right buttons to push :)

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=vB9AK7Pm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-28T00:04:45.768+0000)
>
> These are really cute - and I think Lulu is probably the best of the group!  
> (Soft spot for Nami though.)
> 
> For very tiny amounts of RP, you might try submitting a ticket (as well as one of these awesome drawings) and see if Player Support can help you - Rioters on the boards generally don't have the right buttons to push :)

Thank you for the reply! I will definitely send a ticket as soon as possible before the sale ends haha
